content:
Dear Colleagues,
I am forwarding this calls for positions from CITIUS (https://citius.usc.es/), Spain:

Open call for post-doc in AI (application deadline: 2019-10-31 at 23:59 CET (UCT + 01:00)):
https://citius.usc.es/novidades/noticias/open-position-international-postdoctoral-researcher-artificial-intelligence

Project manager for a new EU project (application deadline: 2019-09-09 at 23:59 CEST (UCT + 02:00)):
https://citius.usc.es/novidades/noticias/open-position-project-manager

Best regards,

Corrado Mencar
